wikipedia_page.main: Ashley Martin Greenwood OBE MC QC (12 June 1912 – 30 September 2003) was a British soldier, lawyer, and judge. He served inter alia as Attorney General of Fiji and Attorney General of Gibraltar, as well as a judge in Uganda. He was also an accomplished mountaineer. He calculated that in his climbing, military and legal careers, he had spent time in 103 countries.

response: *Ashley Greenwood, 91, British soldier, lawyer, and judge.
